named-query.name: READ_OUT_OF_BOX_SECTION_DEFINITIONS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionDefinition FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.SectionDefinition sectionDefinition WHERE sectionDefinition.pageType = :pageType AND sectionDefinition.site is null AND (sectionDefinition.role is null OR sectionDefinition.role IN (:roles))

named-query.name: READ_CUSTOMIZED_SECTION_DEFINITIONS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionDefinition FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.SectionDefinition sectionDefinition WHERE sectionDefinition.pageType = :pageType AND sectionDefinition.site.name = :siteName AND (sectionDefinition.role is null OR sectionDefinition.role IN (:roles))

named-query.name: READ_OUT_OF_BOX_SECTION_FIELDS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionField FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.SectionField sectionField WHERE sectionField.sectionDefinition.sectionName = :sectionName AND sectionField.sectionDefinition.site is null AND sectionField.site is null

named-query.name: READ_CUSTOMIZED_SECTION_FIELDS
named-query.query: SELECT sectionField FROM com.mpower.domain.customization.SectionField sectionField WHERE sectionField.sectionDefinition.id = :sectionDefinitionId AND sectionField.site.name is :siteName
